verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w rage|strong="H7283"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w* plot \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H7385"\w* \w thing|strong="H7385"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w take|strong="H3320"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7336"\w* \w take|strong="H3320"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3245"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w Anointed|strong="H4899"\w*,\f + \fr 2:2 \ft The word “Anointed” is the same as the word for “Messiah” or “Christ”\f* saying,

“Let’s \w break|strong="H5423"\w* \w their|strong="H7993"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* \w apart|strong="H5423"\w*, \w and|strong="H4480"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w their|strong="H7993"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H8064"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w*. \w The|strong="H3427"\w* Lord\f + \fr 2:4 \ft The word translated “Lord” is “Adonai.”\f* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* have \w them|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w derision|strong="H3932"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* them \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* terrify them \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*:

“\w Yet|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H5258"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w decree|strong="H2706"\w*: \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3205"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H7592"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* uttermost parts \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth \w for|strong="H7592"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7489"\w* \w shall|strong="H7626"\w* \w break|strong="H7489"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*. \w You|strong="H7489"\w* \w shall|strong="H7626"\w* \w dash|strong="H5310"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \w in|strong="H7489"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5310"\w* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*’s \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*. \w Be|strong="H4428"\w* \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w*.

Give sincere \w homage|strong="H5401"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Son|strong="H1248"\w*,\f + \fr 2:12 \ft or, Kiss the son\f* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* angry, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* perish \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w soon|strong="H4592"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w*. Blessed \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.
